neighborhoods.name: Old Town
neighborhoods.character: A stunning medieval walled city with limestone streets, historic buildings, and UNESCO World Heritage status, offering a perfect blend of history and modern life.

location.description: The heart of Dubrovnik, completely surrounded by medieval walls, located on a peninsula extending into the Adriatic Sea.

history.overview: Founded in the 7th century, flourished as the Republic of Ragusa from the 14th to 19th centuries, survived earthquakes and wars, and became a UNESCO World Heritage site in 1979.
history.significance: Represents one of the best-preserved medieval cities in the world and the golden age of Mediterranean maritime trade.

transit: Bus connections at Pile and Ploče gates
practical_info.safety: Very safe, with constant tourist presence and police patrols
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Early morning for photos, afternoon for shopping, evening for dining
practical_info.walkability: Highly walkable but with many stairs and uneven surfaces

attractions.name: City Walls
attractions.description: 1.94 km of perfectly preserved medieval walls with spectacular sea and city views.
attractions.appeal: Walk the complete circuit for the best views of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic Sea.

attractions.name: Stradun
attractions.description: The main limestone-paved street running through the heart of the Old Town.
attractions.appeal: Experience the social and commercial center of historic Dubrovnik.

attractions.name: Rector's Palace
attractions.description: Gothic-Renaissance palace that served as the seat of the Republic of Ragusa.
attractions.appeal: Explore the political heart of medieval Dubrovnik and its cultural history.

dining.name: Lady Pi-Pi
dining.known_for: Fresh seafood grilled over open fire
dining.atmosphere: Casual waterfront with authentic local experience.

dining.name: Restaurant 360°
dining.atmosphere: Sophisticated rooftop dining on the city walls.

activities.name: City Walls Walk
activities.description: Complete circuit of the medieval walls with spectacular views.

activities.name: Game of Thrones Tour
activities.description: Visit filming locations from the popular TV series.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the heart of historic Dubrovnik
You enjoy medieval architecture and atmosphere
You want easy access to all major attractions
avoid_if: You want quiet nights (can be busy with tourists)
insider_tips: Visit the walls early morning or late afternoon to avoid crowds and heat
Explore the side streets off Stradun for authentic local experiences
Many restaurants offer better prices and quality away from the main street

neighborhoods.name: Pile
neighborhoods.character: The main entrance to the Old Town with a mix of tourist services, historic significance, and convenient access to the city center.

location.description: Western entrance to the Old Town, featuring the main gate, bus terminal, and tourist information center.

history.overview: Served as the main entrance to the walled city since medieval times, with Fort Lovrijenac protecting the western approach.
history.significance: The primary gateway to Dubrovnik's historic center and a strategic defensive position.
notable_events: Construction of Fort Lovrijenac in the 11th century

practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant tourist traffic
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for fewer crowds, evening for sunset views

attractions.name: Fort Lovrijenac
attractions.description: Impressive fortress on a 37-meter-high rock, often called 'Dubrovnik's Gibraltar'.
attractions.appeal: Spectacular views of the Old Town and Adriatic Sea from this historic defensive structure.

attractions.name: Pile Gate
attractions.description: The main entrance to the Old Town with a drawbridge and defensive features.
attractions.appeal: Experience the dramatic entrance to medieval Dubrovnik.

dining.name: Restaurant Orsan
dining.known_for: Elegant marina dining with sea views

activities.name: Fort Lovrijenac Visit
activities.description: Explore the medieval fortress and enjoy panoramic views.

activities.name: Sunset Photography
activities.description: Capture stunning sunset views of the Old Town from Pile area.

stay_here_if: You want easy access to the Old Town
You prefer convenience and tourist services
avoid_if: You want a quiet, residential atmosphere
You prefer to avoid tourist crowds
insider_tips: Visit Fort Lovrijenac early morning for the best light and fewer crowds
Use the bus terminal for day trips to nearby destinations
Many restaurants offer better value than those inside the walls

neighborhoods.name: Lapad
neighborhoods.character: A peaceful residential area with beautiful beaches, family-friendly atmosphere, and excellent accommodation options.

location.description: Peninsula west of the Old Town, featuring residential areas, beaches, and tourist accommodations.

history.overview: Originally a quiet fishing village, developed as a residential area in the 20th century, now a popular tourist destination with excellent beaches.
history.significance: Represents Dubrovnik's expansion beyond the medieval walls and modern tourism development.
notable_events: Development as residential area in early 20th century

transit: Regular bus service to Old Town
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Summer for beaches, year-round for accommodation
practical_info.walkability: Very walkable with good sidewalks and beach promenades

attractions.name: Lapad Beach
attractions.description: Beautiful pebble beach with crystal-clear waters and excellent facilities.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports with family-friendly atmosphere.

attractions.name: Copacabana Beach
attractions.description: Popular beach with water sports facilities and beach bars.
attractions.appeal: Great for active beachgoers and water sports enthusiasts.

attractions.name: Lapad Market
attractions.description: Daily market offering fresh produce and local products.
attractions.appeal: Experience local life and find fresh ingredients for self-catering.

activities.name: Beach Day
activities.description: Enjoy swimming, sunbathing, and water sports at Lapad beaches.

activities.name: Beach Promenade Walk
activities.description: Scenic walk along the beach promenade with sea views.

stay_here_if: You want a peaceful, family-friendly environment
You enjoy beach activities and outdoor recreation
avoid_if: You want to be in the heart of historic Dubrovnik
You prefer vibrant nightlife and cultural activities
You want immediate access to major attractions
insider_tips: Visit the beaches early morning for the best spots and peaceful atmosphere
Use the local market for fresh produce and authentic local experience
Many restaurants offer better value than those in the Old Town

neighborhoods.name: Gruž
neighborhoods.character: A working port area with commercial activities, ferry connections, and authentic local atmosphere away from tourist crowds.

location.description: Port area northwest of the Old Town, featuring the main harbor, ferry terminal, and commercial district.

history.overview: Developed as Dubrovnik's main port area in the 19th century, replacing the old city harbor, now serves as the primary commercial and transportation hub.
history.significance: Represents Dubrovnik's maritime heritage and modern commercial development.

practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for market, daytime for ferry connections
practical_info.walkability: Moderately walkable with good road connections

attractions.name: Gruž Market
attractions.description: Large daily market offering fresh produce, seafood, and local products.
attractions.appeal: Experience authentic local life and find fresh ingredients at good prices.

attractions.name: Ferry Terminal
attractions.description: Main ferry terminal for connections to nearby islands and coastal destinations.
attractions.appeal: Gateway to island adventures and coastal exploration.

attractions.name: Port Area
attractions.description: Working port with fishing boats and commercial vessels.
attractions.appeal: Observe authentic maritime activities and local fishing culture.

dining.name: Local Konoba
dining.known_for: Authentic local dishes and fresh seafood
dining.atmosphere: Simple, traditional restaurant frequented by locals.

dining.name: Port Café
dining.known_for: Coffee and simple meals with port views
dining.atmosphere: Casual café popular with local workers.

activities.name: Market Shopping
activities.description: Explore the daily market for fresh produce and local products.

activities.name: Ferry to Islands
activities.description: Take ferries to nearby islands like Lokrum, Mljet, or Korčula.

stay_here_if: You want authentic local experience away from tourists
You need ferry connections to islands
avoid_if: You want to be close to major attractions
You prefer tourist amenities and services
You seek upscale dining and shopping
insider_tips: Visit the market early morning for the freshest produce and best prices
Use the ferry terminal for day trips to nearby islands
Many local restaurants offer better value than tourist areas

neighborhoods.name: Ploče
neighborhoods.character: The eastern entrance to the Old Town with a mix of tourist services, historic significance, and access to the eastern beaches.

location.description: Eastern entrance to the Old Town, featuring the Ploče Gate and access to eastern beaches and attractions.

history.overview: Served as the eastern entrance to the walled city, with strategic importance for trade and defense, now a popular tourist area.
history.significance: The eastern gateway to historic Dubrovnik and access point to eastern beaches.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant tourist traffic
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for cable car, afternoon for beach, evening for sunset

attractions.name: Cable Car to Mount Srđ
attractions.description: Cable car offering spectacular panoramic views of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic.
attractions.appeal: Best panoramic views of the city and surrounding islands.

attractions.name: Banje Beach
attractions.description: Popular beach with crystal-clear waters and views of the Old Town walls.
attractions.appeal: Swim with views of the historic city walls and Lokrum Island.

attractions.name: Ploče Gate
attractions.description: Eastern entrance to the Old Town with defensive features.
attractions.appeal: Experience the dramatic eastern entrance to medieval Dubrovnik.

dining.name: Restaurant 360°
dining.atmosphere: Sophisticated rooftop dining on the city walls.

activities.name: Cable Car Ride
activities.description: Take the cable car to Mount Srđ for panoramic views.

activities.name: Beach Day at Banje
activities.description: Enjoy swimming and sunbathing with views of the Old Town.

stay_here_if: You want easy access to the Old Town and beaches
You enjoy panoramic views and cable car rides
You prefer convenience and tourist services
avoid_if: You want a quiet, residential atmosphere
You prefer to avoid tourist crowds
insider_tips: Take the cable car at sunset for the most spectacular views
Visit Banje Beach early morning for the best spots and peaceful atmosphere
Many restaurants offer better value than those inside the walls

spring: Walking the City Walls in Old Town
Cable Car Rides to Mount Srđ
Beach Visits at Lapad and Banje
autumn: Cable Car Views of Autumn Colors
